TopicTitle: How to upload pictures to here from Xbox One?

Articles.Content: As above. I'm not sure if this is the correct subforum.

The only way I know of requires the use of a program that's only available to xbox game developers, that networks a local PC to an xbox. Other than that, I'm not sure it's even possible. You might be able to upload a screenshot to some MS xbox site, and then link to that from here.
You can use the Xbox Console Companion on Windows 10 to access screenshots from your Xbox and download them.
I usually take a screenshot, and share it to another device using the power of onedrive.
